title: A House Is Not a Home

sources.title: A House Is Not a Home
sources.description: Title: A House Is Not a Home Summary: Based on Polly Adler's best-selling autobiography about her life in the Roaring Twenties as a legendary Madam. The movie follows Polly's life from an immigrant worker to becoming friend and... Directed by: Russell Rouse Actors: Shelley Winters, Robert Taylor, Cesar Romero Production Company: Embassy Pictures Release Date: November 1964 (Austria) Aspect Ratio: 1.85 : 1 Based on Polly Adler's best-selling autobiography about her life in the Roaring Twenties as a legendary Madam. The movie follows Polly's life from an immigrant worker to becoming friend and confidante of underworld bigwigs, social leaders, businessmen, politicians, writers and artists.

metadata.Plot: Based on Polly Adler's best-selling autobiography about her life in the Roaring Twenties as a legendary Madam. The movie follows Polly's (Shelley Winters') life from an immigrant worker to becoming friend and confidante of underworld bigwigs, social leaders, businessmen, politicians, writers, and artists.
metadata.Writer: Russell Rouse, Clarence Greene, Polly Adler
metadata.Actors: Shelley Winters, Robert Taylor, Cesar Romero
